summary: The BuildRequest contains no explicit implementation requirements beyond deployment intent and constraints/non-goals. The diff does not show any Internet Computer deployment/hosting changes; instead it introduces substantial new backend functionality and updates project tracking metadata, which appears outside scope and conflicts with the stated non-goals (no new site features/pages unrelated to deployment).

hallucinated_features.description: Added extensive new backend domain model and APIs (user profiles, organization details, about-us content, projects, gallery, access control, blob storage mixins/authorization).
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest specifies no feature changes and explicitly lists non-goals like adding new site features unrelated to deployment; these backend additions constitute new functionality rather than deployment configuration.

hallucinated_features.description: Introduced/updated project tracking state indicating a pending feature request (AR-1) and deployment-related summary metadata.
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirement in the BuildRequest asked to add or modify internal project tracking files; this is extra work not requested by the user-facing deployment task description.
